author: tsmith
title: Turmeric Tonic
text:
Share on Pinterest Share on Pinterest 
This colorful drink is like sunshine in a cup! Switch out your morning coffee with a revitalizing glass of turmeric tonic. Not only does turmeric increase antioxidant levels, it may also help ward off heart attacks and reduce inflammation in the body. Ingredients 4 tsp raw ginger powder 2 tsp fresh lemon juice 3 tbsp agave syrup cayenne pepper Directions 
1. Pour turmeric, ginger, lemon, agave syrup, and 1/3 cup water into a glass and stir.
